Reviews.Content: I'm not sure what else I can say here as it's probably already mentioned in the other one thousand reviews. It's a great camera. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Like the size
Reviews.Author: Judith Stodola
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied wth the Canon SX260.  It had been recommended to me by a friend for a great camera to take on trips for its size and quality of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Overall good product for the money
Reviews.Author: yunus
Reviews.Content: I like the product. Especially, the videos are excellent. But I have some concerns:1- The pictures I took when the people or things are moving are blurry. (If you know how to fix this please let me know. IS didn't work)2- Battery life didn't match with my expectations. You should buy an extra battery. One more thing for the battery is that it's not rechargeable via computer.At the end, I would recommend this if you don't have a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Oh my gosh!
Reviews.Author: Mark Schumacher
Reviews.Content: For a pocket camera these are spectacular. I have owned many camera systems. But who wants to carry around pro camera day to day!!!?? Not me, so I was missing a million shots. When I went to Europe, I brought 2!!! Had them mounted on both hips. I took 4700 shots. 99% were good to go ( no focus or exposure issues ). I did huge panoramas and stitched them together later. FAN TASTIC!! Oh... If I had dropped one in the water, I wouldn't have committed suicide. Glad I left my pro camera home. It is a point and shoot, but a great one. Point and shoots have their limitations, I just worked around them. If you are really into photography, upload the CHDK to push this thing far beyond the limits.I AM PLEASED

Reviews.Title: Final choice!
Reviews.Author: Ginny L.
Reviews.Content: My very old Canon still takes great pictures but it is so slow and inconvenient. I read the reviews and recommendations here and ordered four different models before I decided to choose the PowerShot SX260. The 280 was great but has battery problems and I'm not technical enough to deal with downloaded fixes. I had a little trouble downloading the software when my camera was connected to the download but when I detached it the download went forward and the computer reads my camera so it's great. The pictures are beautiful. I use auto most of the time, but the capabilities of the 260 are varied so I'm sure I'll be using it for experimenting and learning. This is a 5-star camera.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom
Reviews.Author: Diego Garcia
Reviews.Content: You can even shoot the moon with great detail.Manual function a bit basic, though.Still recommend getting it even for amateur photographers.

Reviews.Title: Great Zoom
Reviews.Author: Pdshopper
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera on friend's recommendation.  Would like to have a printed manual even though it is available online. Manual is not great. Can't find how to do certain functions.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: michael moran
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. It is very easy to use. Takes great pics. I highly recommend this one

Reviews.Title: Nice photos
Reviews.Author: Arlena
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pictures taken with this camera is very good, my only complaint is about the flash: first, it is located right where you place your finger when holding the camera, so as many other users have complained, it often prevents the flash from coming out, and when this happens you have turn off the camera and then back on to "reset" it, also, the flash comes often when is not needed, even with the flash set to be "off". Also, for a camera like this, it lacks of an easy way to do panoramic photos (even an iPhone camera can easily do that), which is quite disappointing. However, altogether, is a solid camera and it takes good pictures, even when zooming in. I will continue to purchase Canon cameras.

Reviews.Title: lots of features
Reviews.Author: RICHARD S.
Reviews.Content: this is our 3rd digi-cam.probably more features than i'll ever use. beautiful stills and the steady-cam works very well. good buy, highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: lsmith
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Great zoom and great pictures. Had an older Canon powershot that broke so decided on this one after reading reviews. Still figuring out how everything works on it but love it so far. Only thing I did not like was that it did not come with a user manual booklet. It comes with a cd of the user manual. However, I like the booklet so I am not left staring at a computer screen while trying to figure the camera out. But I called Canon and they are printing one out and mailing it to me. So problem solved. Great Camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Takes good picture.  Fragile lense shutter
Reviews.Author: C. Wu
Reviews.Content: After used it for a fre months.  the lense shutter broke.  I can not find a good case for it.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: Darla Lin Backer
Reviews.Content: This is hands down the greatest camera I have ever owned! Very reasonably priced and the pictures are crystal clear. Very easy to use!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Marcus Solomon
Reviews.Content: The camera takes excellent photos,  the touch and feel is acceptable. The gps system is plus at that price, the time is takes too shoot a shot can be below average at times. The many other features added is great but takes getting use too.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - Died After Warranty Expired
Reviews.Author: TechDiva
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with great pic quality and ease of use.  I love Canon cameras.  However, I am surprised by this one as it is the first Canon ever (in 20+ years of buying Canon Cameras) to die on me.  I am truly hoping this was a lemon in the bunch.  Looking for my next Canon camera now.

Reviews.Title: like
Reviews.Author: bw1967
Reviews.Content: Good camera for what we use it for.  Battery life is long.  Sometimes shutter speed seems slow, nice camera product.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kerrie
Reviews.Content: The camera is a good size and very easy to use. The only issue I have is that the flash occasionally does not go off and you really have to hold down the button for it to go off. Other then that small issue it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: purchased camera on cyber Monday... still learning how to use and get the most out of my new camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie Jorstad
Reviews.Content: Took pics over the holidays and have some questions/ concerns - *1) bad flash location/ poor camera design feature: because of the camera's narrow profile, it is hard to hold the camera with the left hand when the flash pops up in the upper left hand corner of this camera, contributes to undesireable camera shaking 2) frequently the message "busy" came up the view finder window- what is this about? 3) disappointed with short lithium battery life, took inside pics for maybe 2 hrs tops before I had to replace with backup battery *4) lack of clear directions on how to delete pics, or too many steps to take, not a user friendly feature > have any suggestions? plan to watch CD for additional tipsThanks. Would appreciate constructive feedback to enhance my overall satisfaction with my recent purchase of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera is Great!
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: Love love love this camera! Takes great pics and the zoom is great!  ITs a bit big but hey what ya gonna do lol

Reviews.Title: Love Canons
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: I think canons make great cameras. I had to buy a new one because the zoom on my last one broke. This zoom is even higher and the pictures were even better.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Just wonderful...more than expected!  The setup is so easy.  Even the video clips are excellent, much better than the older one.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: S. Jinadasa
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  The pictures are awesome.  Perfect for travel. The user interface is very easy to get used to.  Even though there are so many features to customize the light and exposure, the preset settings are pretty good for quick pictures.  Highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot SX260
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L Breland
Reviews.Content: If you want a beautiful picture of the moon using a small hand-held camera, this camera is for you.  It takes nice photos but have not mastered all it can do yet so some pictures are not as great as they probably would be otherwise.  It is great as a point and shoot.  It takes wonderful close up photos.  I do not find the flower setting works well, works better as point and shoot.  I have trouble with moving object (sports) but it takes great shots when the car is moving of landscapes.  I have taken awesome photos of birds in trees -- things that are not close.  It does well of animals too.  I love the camera, just wish I'd get around to reading the book!!

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie Katz "Jamie Katz, reader and writer"
Reviews.Content: Excellent small camera.  Fairly long zoom in a small package.  Easy to use but provides photos that have lively colors and accurate focusing.  I have a Canon DSLR, but for convenience, I've sometimes travelled just with this little guy and I've been very happy.  Makes life, and taking pictures, very easy and enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: SO-so
Reviews.Author: Mark Morris
Reviews.Content: Doesn't take very good pictures of activities/movement in low light, they seem yellow with flash and the flash doesn't always come on automatically making for dark photos.  Daytime photos however are great...

Reviews.Title: A bit awkward in size and use, but VERY good
Reviews.Author: Joe Z
Reviews.Content: Great p&s; camera with almost full manual control. That's good and bad. Full control is good, but doing it on a little camera like this is a bit awkward. I leave it in AV mode unless I'm shooting for speed. Lens stability is good (25-500mm equiv), but even with IS I get shake at over 350mm (about 60mm in camera). Having said that, when you want to grab a l-o-n-g shot it's just a compromise you have to live with. Photo quality is still pretty good. My only quibble is it's too big for a pocket and too small for a case. Kind of an awkward size. Still worth 5 stars if you want a small, do-everything camera.

Reviews.Title: Liked my last Cannon, but regretting this one. Poor placement of the flash.
Reviews.Author: kyravon
Reviews.Content: Very unhappy with it.  Bought it less than a year ago to replace the previous Cannon I had.  I was happy with my previous one and bought this one because I wanted better pictures in lowlight and a better zoom.Poor design: the flash comes up right where everyone tries to hold the camera.  So everyone who tries to take a photo with the camera nearly drops it when the flash tries to come up under their fingers.  I'm actually surprised the flash hasn't broken yet.A few months after purchasing the battery does not hold power well.  My last Cannon camera barely needed charging except at the end of a picture heavy day.  This one runs out of battery life even after only used a few times.Also just recently it's stopped downloading pictures to my lap top.  The camera says there's a "communication error".I am really annoyed.  I should ahve stuck with my last Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX260 HS
Reviews.Author: K. Brady
Reviews.Content: Goes through batteries quick!!  You must have a back-up battery, in my opinion.  I have had this camera for about 6 months and the reviews I read about short battery life are true.  It is a little slower between shots that n other Canon POS's - I was able to speed that up somewhat by purchasing a much faster SD card that the stock card that comes with it.  It has a GPS function, which adds to the intense battery usage, which I don't use BTW.Overall a very nice camera in need of a few refinements.Pros; The pictures are very clear.The zoom features are awesome.Very compactEasy to use on automatic or very customizable with a myriad of settings.Cons;  Heavy battery userSlow to "boot up"

Reviews.Title: needed a good, reasonably priced point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: My son has this camera and really likes it. My Nikon cool pix died on me, so I thought I'd give the Canon a try. I couldn't be happier- it takes great quality pictures, has more features than I'll ever use, and the zoom is outstanding. A great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Photos
Reviews.Author: andre876
Reviews.Content: Great product...excellent pictures. Super fast startup time...very easy to use...canon is definitely one of the best cameras out there. Must buy

Reviews.Title: great photos!
Reviews.Author: Joanne Martin
Reviews.Content: Great photos were taken on vacation.Lovely colors came through in the photos.The speed of taking multiple photos was a great improvement over our previous camera.

Reviews.Title: great buy and seller
Reviews.Author: Omar Veerasammy
Reviews.Content: Thank for a great online shopping experience.  Everything I wanted and more.  I love my new camera.  thank you so much

Reviews.Title: wonderful  camera
Reviews.Author: janet feuss
Reviews.Content: holding the camera when the flash pops up is the only bad thing as my finger gets in the way of the flash. a little more room on the side to hold onto would be better.i love the 20 zoom on this.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Dad
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the service and the quality of the item as it was just what I needed. Well done.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: JC Arana
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on January, and it takes pretty nice photos.... I liked it a lot.  It was stolen one month ago, so I purchased another one, and it is right on its way to home now.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: justaguy
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that I am by no means an expert on cameras, but like most people I just wanted a camera that would take good photos, high quality video, and have good zoom range. This camera did all of those things and I continue to find new features and settings to take photos in all situations. I would recommend this camera to a friend and would buy it again if I had to do it all over again.

Reviews.Title: Powershot SX260HS
Reviews.Author: Andrew Bishop
Reviews.Content: Great Camera. - Bought as a Christmas present for my parents.I have owned a number of point and shoot cameras over the years, and will only buy canon powershots, I've owned 5 small digital cameras over the last 12 years, and will now only buy powershots. - (I do own nikon DSLR though)Very nice camera.  - easy to use (as they upgraded from an earlier powershot)My only criticism; the flash pops out of the top of the camera when needed. - pain in the rear - it's exactly where you hold the camera. they should have stuck with leaving it on the front, rather than adding un-needed complexity.Great zoom - 20X optical.

Reviews.Title: Wish I'd have had this camera years ago...
Reviews.Author: shane eversoll
Reviews.Content: LOVE this camera. Chose it over the SX280HS and I'm so glad I did. Takes beautiful pictures at a great price!!

Reviews.Title: My SX 260
Reviews.Author: David P Vardo
Reviews.Content: What makes a camera great is not only the picture quality or feature set, or even the lens, all of which this camera has, but rather does this camera do what you expect of it. This camera does , all of the features I seek, and it does them very well indeed. It receives an excellent rating for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely unbelievable
Reviews.Author: Ashley J.
Reviews.Content: It's hard to believe the the pictures this little camera can take.  It has the ability to zoom in incredibly far without compromising image quality, and the 'Auto' settings are very easy to use.  Image stabilization is near-perfect.  I take all my pictures hand-held, and I never miss a shot.  I've taken ~300 photos in the week that I've had it, and not a single one had to be deleted or re-done.  Images can get a little grainy in low-light without a flash (on 'Auto'), but the night time scene works really well.If you're looking for a hand-held point and shoot that takes amazing pictures, look no further.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for trips
Reviews.Author: Dennis Wardell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this back on Apr 1 for 2 week trip to New Zealand & Australia. I currently own a Minolta Maxxum 5D DSLR 6.1 MP with all the lens to go with it, but as we were traveling light I wanted to cut down on the 20-30 lbs. of camera gear I normally travel with. As my longest lens is a 75-300 mm lens (APS-C equivalent 112-450 MM), I wanted a replacement camera with at least that long of a focal length. I also wanted something that could replace my JVC camcorder as well. As my wife already owned a Canon PowerShot SD850is I was familiar with their build and quality.  I found the camera easy to use and enjoyed not having to be changing lens every time I wanted to zoom in or out on a subject. I am not a professional photographer so can not qualitatively report on the quality of my pictures, but I feel they are as good as any I have taken with my Maxxum 5D or previously to that the Minolta 35 mm SLR I still own. The video was extremely good as well. The only complaint I have is the placement of the flash. It is on top of the camera where my left hand index finger would sit, thus would hit my finger and not extract fully every time I needed the flash. It would also be nice if the flash could stay on while video taping in low light.If you are looking for a moderately priced camera with a long focal length and video recording capabilities then this can work for you.

Reviews.Title: nice camera for trip;s
Reviews.Author: janfra
Reviews.Content: It is compact easy to handle, takes movies too, so far photos have been real clear and printed real well, good for trips.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera....
Reviews.Author: WMF "Wanderer"
Reviews.Content: I have had two previous Canon PowerShot Elph cameras, and ordered this one because I finally dropped my 100HS too many times after 7 years and broke the screen on the back.  (NOTE:  It's still working in terms of taking pics, but I can't see what I'm shooting!)  After reading about a lot of the new ones with touch screens - something I did not want - I decided to try the SX 260 HS 12.1 MP, and it is terrific.  It's still small enough and light enough, but has a 20x optical zoom which is nothing short of fantastic.  I've seen others complain that it is blurry, but that is if you go past the 20x optical into the digital zoom, which is of course going to blur.  You can clearly see the limits of the 20x optical zoom if you look at the bar indicating the zoom strength being used.  One thing I would say is the picture shows the lens with no cover, and mine has the same type of protective onion-layered type of cover that has been on my other PowerShot Elphs by Canon.  No worries.  It is definitely a great buy and another great camera by Canon.  p.s. I still love my little 100HS so much I ordered another one just because.  For the money these can't be beat.  I get compliments all the time on my photos by people using much more expensive and sophisticated cameras.  Oh yeah, and this one - as well as my other PowerShot Elphs - shoots great video with great sound!  I'm a believer and a loyal customer.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: roywb
Reviews.Content: This camera has so much on it that I will never understand it all but it takes the best pictures of any camera I have owned.  I will have to play with it some more but it is good.

Reviews.Title: My favorite camera!
Reviews.Author: QuellyEnvi
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is very easy to use and my photos turn out great! I still have not used it to its full capacity, the auto settings are fantastic! The zoom is phenomenal!  I take several bird shots which are usually tricky to shoot... not with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: SandeeZ
Reviews.Content: Compact and easy to keep in my purse for whatever picture moment should arise.  The picture quality is great.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon's excellent customer service AND an excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Terri R. Fish
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera just a bit over a year ago to take on a trip to Europe. I have had several Canons in the past and had always been pleased with each of them. My  Canon PowerShot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full-HD Video (Black) did not disappoint. The images are very clear, the controls easy to use and the performance is usually fast (some caveats in low light, flash photography especially with a battery that needs charging). I love the small size, being compact enough to carry in my front pocket while I hike or travel. I was able to get alot of great shots during the travels for which I purchased the camera. I continue to enjoy it for every day pics, hikes, travel, skiing,...BUT---The reason that I felt prompted to write this review is due to my experience these past two weeks with Canon's repair department. About 10 days ago I noticed that I could not use my self-timer as that functionality of the control dial had apparently broken since my last usage (a hike a couple of weeks ago). Using Canon's support website I very quickly ascertained that the product was still under warranty (Yay!) and could be returned for repair. The online forms were quite easy to fill out and in a snap I had the camera sent off. I received a confirmation email within a couple of days as well as two more emails within the next week keeping me informed on the status of my repair. Due to the nature of the malfunction, Canon chose to replace the product, at no cost to me. I received it via FedEx today. It is labeled as "refurbished" but looks brand new. All the parts were in the box as if it were new and it works like a charm, just like it did previously. Also, in the course of my repair I had occasion to call the Canon repair center in Irvine and both times was treated very efficiently and with friendly service. I was very impressed with the entire repair experience and will definitely favor Canon's products for my future purchases as I have found them to have the best feature sets as well as superior customer service. Thank-you Canon!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: TexasTom
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and easy to use. I don't like the placement of the pop-up flash. When you are not thinking about the flash and are holding the camera normally the pop-up flash comes up and hits your left hand finger which disrupts the shot.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Gardenia
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for an old Nikon.  Much improved image stabilization.  Much easier to get a good shot.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot excellent in Quality
Reviews.Author: N. Ngo
Reviews.Content: Had read a lot of reviews before deciding to get this one.  We weren't disappointed as the quality of the camera taking pictures and videos exceeded our expectations.  To us, it was quite costly on the expensive side, but well worth the features and output of our photos.  So clear in quality and resolution was outstanding.  Although there are additional features on the photo that we'd have to read upon to take advantage of the feature, the basic usage was simple.  The only thing that throws us off on the camera is the location of the flash; when we set the camera to Automatic, the flash button stays disabled, but when we change the settings and want the flash to work (if our hands are positioned on the top left hand side of the camera, it will startle us as an unexpected place for the camera to pop up).  Other than that, this is a fine camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Harold D. Minkin
Reviews.Content: I purchased  this as an upgrade from my Panasonic 10x which I have owned for about 4yrs.  Has a 20x zoom and the stability and colors especially in low light are great. The stabilization feature works wonderful as well, no more fuzzy pictures if I moved slightly.Also very easy to use and comes with a clear stick on for the viewer. I recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Unexpectedly Great
Reviews.Author: Ian Zankman
Reviews.Content: Very good camera with versatile features...had the best vacation and the photos I took with the camera are fantastic for a point and shoot!!

Reviews.Title: Great Canon product...
Reviews.Author: Louise Deziel
Reviews.Content: Wonderful little camera.....so many great features. Still need to " play " with it some to actually learn how to use features...but this camera will be a great " take a long " on holidays .

Reviews.Title: Super quality, compact size
Reviews.Author: F. Green
Reviews.Content: This camera is the threshold between small size and photo quality.  Too bad a view finder could not be squeezed into the design.

Reviews.Title: Canon Digital Camera SX 260
Reviews.Author: LYBA  E. RABINOWITZ
Reviews.Content: This product is the best one I have ever used.  I have some old cameras but this one is very easy to use.  The quality of this item is above my expectations.  I suggest you should buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Very convenient.
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: Very handy little camera perfect for traveling with and always ready to catch the shot. Good picture quality and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Jill Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Quality of photos is great and its easy to use.  Compact design with powerful zoom is something I hadn't found in other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Rose of Washington Square
Reviews.Content: Recommended by a friend that did a lot of camera research.  This camera is lightweight & slim. It has sharp clarity and triple zoom.

Reviews.Title: Very High Quality
Reviews.Author: anbcal11
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Panasonic Lumix, which i really liked, but the new model is now touchscreen, which i am not a fan of. So, i went for the Canon equivalent and am very pleased. It takes really great pictures but isn't necessarily a "point and shoot" kind of camera accept on the auto setting. There are many ways to customize settings, which i like, but it i stumbled through finding settings. Reading the manual would probably be beneficial to maximize the potential of the camera. The best part for me is the 20x zoom, i never miss the photo, unlike my friends that think an iphone is an ideal camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera  Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mary Price
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures.  Very portable and compact--color and quality are excellent.  very nice camera thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: When I first received the camera I didn't think things were going to work out.  The seller was right there doing everything possible to make things right which he did.  I would definitely feel confident in purchasing from him again.  Great job.

Reviews.Title: Amazing shots
Reviews.Author: HW7
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded (by quite a bit, may I add) from an Olympus Tough 1030W to this camera. I have been AMAZED at the picture quality. I've had people look at my pictures and ask for the name of my camera so that they can get one themselves. With 20X zoom, you can get really close to your subject, and it doesn't appear pixelated in the least. I like the ability to zoom in while filming.One annoyance with this camera is that the flash pops out of the top of it. This was actually one of the features that attracted me to the camera. However, when I've asked strangers to take a photo of myself and friends, they always seem to have their finger over the flash when it pops up unexpectedly and startles them. I never have the flash setting on but I guess they must switch it on before taking the picture?All in all.. VERY happy with this camera. Much recommended!

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my new camera!
Reviews.Author: chaya garfunkel
Reviews.Content: I am just a mom who wants cri!sp, clear pictures of my kids.  This camera gets gorgeous outdoor shots.  Sometimes the indoor shots don't come out well, I'm not sure why.  And there is a pause between clicking the button and the actual picture snapping, which sometimes means missing that perfect shot-bc little boys don't sit still!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Eddie Hui
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old cannon because of the telephoto lens feature. The drwback is it is heavier and bigger in size. Thanks God it just fit my camera purse.

Reviews.Title: All Digital Cameras have tradeoffs
Reviews.Author: P. Firth
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my XS 260, but that doesn't mean it couldn't be better.PROS:1. I like the 20x optical zoom. When you're travelling, it's surprising how much being able to zoom in can help.2. The camera turns on quite quickly. Much faster than my previous Sony. The 1.5 second delay is about how long it takes you to raise it up to frame the shot. Very good.3. I haven't used it yet, but single-button video recording is going to come in VERY handy. Nothing worse than fumbling instead of recording.4. There seem to be a LOT of manual modes. They are of somewhat limited use when the total F-stop range is quite small.CONS:1. The pop-up flash pops up right under your left hand, with no real warning. And it doesn't pop down when you no longer need it. It just stays in the way.2. The GPS, when set to "always on" doesn't always seem to pick up a location. Mine never found a GPS signal after 2 hours wandering around Detroit airport. And after about 2 days of GPS tracking, the newly charged new battery was dead.3. Scene selection is still a royal pain. It's hard to find the selections, hard to choose one, and hard to know what will happen when you do. The descriptions are only vaguely related to what you really want. More work required here.4. The "spinner" wheel around the OK button is a little too small and flat for my thick fingers. It's VERY hard to rotate the wheel without pressing one of the five buttons around and inside of it. At least for me. I'm starting to think a touch-screen would be better.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: clara muhlenkamp
Reviews.Content: for his price and size fulfill all my expectations,very good photos,very easy and simple to use,thats what i want easy work good photos little size and weight

Reviews.Title: Sweet little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeannie French
Reviews.Content: great photos, easy to use. I have a Canon DSLR that I love but it is too big to carry around for many occasions. The SX260  small and easy to carry around. Great for informal shots. The video feature is great for my kid's soccer games.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: NV
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my canon elph. I have a DSLR, but its too big to carry around all over the place, so this is a good alternative. It has a great zoom and good quality pictures. Its very convenient to take wherever you need to go and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: small and powerfull
Reviews.Author: Mikhail Romanov
Reviews.Content: I love this camera so far - great pictures even at night, zoom is amazing (80x total !). The only concern is position of the built-in flash (it constantly gets under my finger).

Reviews.Title: A must have.
Reviews.Author: Paraty
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, it has a really nice resolution, good ISO to take photos with low light and the 20x zoom is another positive fact.

Reviews.Title: Great features, small package.
Reviews.Author: M. P. DONNELLY
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my aging Canon SD630.  I usually keep a point & shoot with me at work since my SLR is a little bulky to carry around when I want to take pictures on the fly.  This camera has great features, but I'm especially pleased with the full manual control of the shutter and the f-stop.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: gave to my girlfriend for her birthday, great features, compact, batterie last decent amount of time. Nice looking, glad i got it.

Reviews.Title: Powerful & Portable
Reviews.Author: Vishal
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera with excellent picture quality. I still need to explore more but so far I am happy and satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Recommend
Reviews.Author: georgebkiss
Reviews.Content: Recomedo this product. You take great pictures and videos in full HD.With a 20x reach, a 12.1 megapixel backlit CMOS sensor, a new image processor.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: This is my second digital camera. I got it after my iphone met an untimely end. It has great options and seems like it can do more than I really know what to do with. I am taking it with me on an archeological dig in the scrublands of Florida so we will see how it holds up to sand, surf and humidity. Takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: It has exceeded my expectations:
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: The Canon  Power Shot SX260 HS, is everything that consumer reports said it was and then some! The cameras ability to reach out for a closeup is incredible. I work in the cities and jungles of Southeast Asia and I truly regret not having this camera on the first 7 trips as it also doubles as my HD video recorder. I would recommend this camera to any one short of a professional photographer.  Carl Moody (Traveling Apostles for Christ)

Reviews.Title: This camera exceeded expectations! LOVE the stabilizer as I frequently have a shakey hand.
Reviews.Author: jeanne
Reviews.Content: The zoom and wide angle lens is incredible, takes beautiful pictures. Would have been nice to have wifi, but the quality out weighs that feature. Happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: T. Burgess "Burgie808"
Reviews.Content: easy to use. not too complicated...will review once we come back from our travels. Price was great, think we got it all.

Reviews.Title: pictures are so much better than my old camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Mcleish
Reviews.Content: I still haven't used most of the available functions on this camera, but I'm very pleased with the shots I've taken.  Colours are brighter, images are clearer and the zoom is invaluable for capturing those candid shots.  Another winner from Canon!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Pedro R. Arriaga
Reviews.Content: Small profile, excellent zoom, good travel companion. The best thing is the price at this point in time. I will recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: D. Patten
Reviews.Content: I have always had canon cameras and this one is the best.  It takes great pictures, easy to load on computer and upload to internet.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Kanefsky
Reviews.Content: Every few years we seem to buy and replace our prior digital camera...they either stop working or as the last one (Sony), it developed a black spot in the middle of the lense and it would have cost just about as much as a new camera to get it fixed. As usual we received it quickly from Amazon (Prime is great). The camera works well...filled with features that my wife is enjoying exploring. Since she is the photographer (I am point and shoot...she is "lets be creative"), she likes the clarity of the pictures, she loves the small size (she says the weight of the camera is right...but it is heavier than our last camera). All in all...it has been a good buy.

Reviews.Title: First Canon Since my AE-1
Reviews.Author: K. Ann Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: This camera is Great for taking Pictures outside! This is the First Canon Camera I've owed since my Canon AE-1 and my Canon T-50, both were great camera's! I Like the Smaller SX260HS Much better, because its lighter than my older cameras!  I am Not a Professional Picture Taker, I Just Enjoy taking Pictures for my from to Northern California from were I was born there!I also love taking Pictures of Oregon Now were I live. There are many beautiful Places in the USA to Visit. I am Still Learning how to use my newer SX260HS right now.Take Care Everyone!~Kristi

Reviews.Title: Love, love!
Reviews.Author: Tara N "Tara"
Reviews.Content: I am by NOOO means a professional photographer.  I am a scrapbooker, and like to take pictures simply, without 100 lenses, filters, ISO adjustments, and other complicated stuff.  The modes on this camera are AMAZING.  The face smoothing feature is great (makes me look like a model-oh yeah!), the color swapping is awesome, the zoom works great, and the red is actually really pink, which I like better.  This is the BEST camera for easy users who don't want to spend their trips adjusting and fiddling with lenses.

Reviews.Title: great pics
Reviews.Author: Ali M Hussain
Reviews.Content: This camera gives you the professional feel with the great pics it takes, and best of all the GPS feature adds history to it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for pro -
Reviews.Author: Prasenjit Ghosh
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent in capturing good qulity images and also takes high quality video (thiugh not sure it would be really Full HD in the low light but in daylight it's almost close to perfect HD).Only problem I faced regarding the position of the flash - its kinda awkward !! Definitely a good camera I would reommend!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Dala Griffeth
Reviews.Content: takes GREAT shots, many settings, nice big screen, easy to use...i just wish i would remember to keep my finger off of the flash that pops up when it needs to.  have a little trouble uploading my photos from the computer to facebook though.  not sure if i'm doing something wrong or if it is the software.  i would definitely recommend this camera to anyone that asks.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for price
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Just what we wanted. Good pics for reasonable price. Easy to use. Canon cameras are my favorite. have bought several.

Reviews.Title: What a GEM
Reviews.Author: Sandie "Sandie"
Reviews.Content: Pro; Excellent photosThe zoom is incredible.Cons; A bit heavyMust learn to hold differently due to GPS and pop-up flashPrint out the manual, it needs to be studied

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures and videos
Reviews.Author: Charles T. Grant
Reviews.Content: It has almost all the features of a SLR camera, but is small enough to fit in your pocket. Picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: adrie
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Fantastic zoom for this size camera. Takes very clear photos and is easy to use. Great battery life. Quick shipping from Amazon. Very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fatal Flash Flaw
Reviews.Author: A. Shuler
Reviews.Content: Pros: Read what others have been saying.  Overall, this camera has some outstanding features.  It's a bit clunky looking, but MUCH smaller than a DSLR and bridges the gap between my T4i and Sony WX-10.  Extra-wide angle is a plus.Cons:- As others have reported, the Flash system is BROKEN on this camera.  If you hold the camera naturally and the camera thinks it needs a flash, it has a motor that pushes the flash up.  If you block the flash as it comes up, you get an error message that requires taking the battery out to clear.  Solution?  I haven't found one.  They should have spring-loaded the flash.  I've had this happen a dozen times or so.- Second star comes off for the lack of a Panorama setting.  Canon, if you're listening, GIVE US IN-CAMERA PANORAMA PROCESSING!  Why?  Because EVERYBODY ELSE IS doing it and we want it.

Reviews.Title: Nice and compact
Reviews.Author: carol schneider
Reviews.Content: I haven't gotten to use it much yet but what I have seen it seems to be a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for concerts
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures at concerts. Good video as well. Feels solid and survived some heavy duty drops.  Pretty good battery life.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love this camera...perfect for family pictures
Reviews.Author: Molly Murphy
Reviews.Content: I got this to be able to capture my toddler in motion and it is fantastic. It focuses and takes the pictures quickly, allowing you to capture the perfect shots. I know very little about cameras, but the pictures turn out perfect. It is fully automated for someone like me, but has manual features for someone who would know what they were doing. I wish I would have gotten one sooner. I haven't had it long (3 weeks?), but I think I've taken more pictures than I have in the last year with my old one. It's a keeper!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: bee
Reviews.Content: works well and pretty much as the other assessments rated it. Taken some great photos and I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Heavy but the 20x is worth the weight
Reviews.Author: JDR
Reviews.Content: another good Canon camera I have 4 different Canons and all are good.  This is a bit heavy but again worth the weight for the zoom and ease of use.  As all the reviews noted this is an excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: wow.  the technology has greatly improved.
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Spinuzza
Reviews.Content: wow.  the technology has greatly improved.  the zoom on this camera is amazing and the picture quality is exceptional.  We were working with "old" digital cameras... I guess it's like computers  this one blew me away... worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: First camera I've owned that REQUIRES a memory card and it is also the first camera I've owned that has given me constant memory errors.  I've tried 2 different 16GB cards and an 8GB. They all work on and off but not consistently which is very annoying.  What brought me here now to write this review was the last 45 minutes I spent popping out my mem card and battery with no luck. (this has happened several times in only a couple months.) What I really dislike is I only need one picture right now.  Had they provided a small amount of onboard memory I would have extracted my pic 45 minutes ago instead of dealing with the annoyance of constant memory errors.  This camera worked great for a month.  Not worth the money especially when there is no onboard memory.  Why let a memory error situation live and breathe when it doesn't have to be that way.  Not impressed

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: MoJO
Reviews.Content: Bought this over the 16 M pixel whose reviews were not that good. I made the wise choice.  Pictures are very good quality.  And after years of owning Kodak cameras (two of the last chewed through batteries every 5 or so pictures) I am glad I now have a camera that can take quite a few pictures before needing a battery charge!Very happy with this camere!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Camj
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and takes awesome pictures.  I am not camera savvy but this camera is easy to use.  However, the downloading to my PC is not as easy and still trying to figure that out.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Catherine A Baugh
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this digital camera.  Easy to use.  Like the zoom.  Pictures are lovely.  Video quality is nice.  Audio is good. Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Paul A Sisul
Reviews.Content: Great simple camera with a great variety of features.  Simple, fairly easy to use and has excellent zoom capability for a small camera

Reviews.Title: It works well, 20 optical zoom is great
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: The shooting result is like the review: [...]Nice options in AP TP, tune, darkness,Quick shots to freeze waterQuick vidieo to make slow motionWorth the Price

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX260
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Crisp pictures and a nice stable zoom. Controls are intuitive and the camera body is easy to handle - great size for pocket photography.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Burroughs Jr
Reviews.Content: The reviews I read before purchasing this camera were really good and it has lived up to them.  I love the fact that it takes pictures quick, little delay allowing you to get the shot you want.  Very easy to use and picture quality is outstanding.  If you want a point and shoot camera, this would be a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: George Z
Reviews.Content: the sx260 is an impressive camera.  The only thing keeping me from rating it higher is the lack of a proper grip.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: English Myss "Jeanne"
Reviews.Content: Just got the camera (for myself) over the holidays so plan to take it out and test what it really can do.  I wanted a light camera and while this is not the lightest of those now on the market, it can be placed in a pocket with no difficulty. I had read that it took good pictures in low light situations, without a flash, my preference, and it does.  It also takes great closeups with good details.  The button and dials are fairly simple to see and use, and review of the previous shot easy to pull up. I was not thrilled that the battery has to be placed on a charger since I am afraid that the charger wlll get misplaced or won't be available when I need it.  I'll just have to train myself to check the battery status before I go on a photo jaunt.  It has a major zoom range but I find I hardly ever use it for long distances.  Again, have to take a test run.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good pictures (both near and far).  The reason I gave it only 4 stars is the battery doesn't seem to last very long.  If you buy this camera, you will need at least 1 extra battery.  Other than that, so far it has been a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: MrGary52
Reviews.Content: A great camera, takes really nice photos, and is loaded with features, some of which I love, and others I'll probably never use.Add a touchscreen onto this camera and it will become the perfect camera of the future. For now, it's just plain great

Reviews.Title: Canon sx260hs review
Reviews.Author: jansrepair
Reviews.Content: I am happy with canon. The best part is the low light shooting. The zoom is good also.I think the fit and finish is better than the zs 20 The only setback is the placement of the flash it is in the way of your left hand

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Gwennie "franniemay"
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the features I need for my travel pictures.  It is easy to use and does not require much education to understand..

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: tuhinanshu singh
Reviews.Content: I am using the camera and i can say that the pciture quality is just great . It is so  easy to use and  if you  do the right setting  you can click really nice pics with it . Anshu

Reviews.Title: Mostly good but flash poping up where you hold it is annoying
Reviews.Author: Vincent Miller
Reviews.Content: For the most part my wife likes this new camera.The picture's quality is excellent, same for the video.But, the flash sometimes pops up when you are in the middle of trying to take a picture and is distracting ...Also seems a slow to auto focus and allow second shot

Reviews.Title: Great pics, compact, good value
Reviews.Author: H. Cross "HC"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a replacement pocket camera for photo ops with the grand kids.The camera takes great pictures without the flash. I like the 12 MP and the 20x zoom. The camera has a good, quality feel to it. For my needs it is perfect.Good value. Arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Just Right
Reviews.Author: Karen Berg
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera, at least for my purposes.  I love taking close up shots (especially of nature)so the zoom is perfect.  One problem is that when you zoom in, you must hold your breath so that the picture does not come out blurry. The shutter speed is extremely fast. So you usually end up with the picture you wanted plus an extra shot, maybe of the grass that was surrounding that deer.  But otherwise with a little more practice I'm sure this camera will be perfect......

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: suejeff
Reviews.Content: A lot of features for a relatively inexpensive camera. It takes some time to learn to use it. great bargain.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Bernie From Phoenix "Maxthedog"
Reviews.Content: turns on fast. takes great pictures. lot of options. zoom is incredible(need tripod if you shake any on full zoom). I would recomend to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: abby
Reviews.Content: It is a very good machine. One of the best i ever have. The GPS is a kind of plus. The quality of the picture is wonderful and the 20 X zoom awesome. Hundred porcent i wll recomend

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX260 HS Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: Camasman
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. When you throw in the Amazon pricing, it is even better. The picture quality is outstanding. The zoom feature is very effective at bringing distance objects closer. Combined with the image stabilization, the zoom is great. I've only had the camera for a few weeks, but know it is superior to the other point and shoot cameras used by others in my family. I also appreciate how intuitive the controls are. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great compact package
Reviews.Author: LambsWool
Reviews.Content: I would definately recommend this camera. Loaded with plenty of features and excellent picture quality (even in lower light, thanks to back-lit CMOS sensor). HD-Movie quality actually surpasses my ditgital camcorder. This camera is a lot smaller than our old one and it took a little bit to get used to holding it correctly without interfering with the camera's automatic flash. LCD screen is large and easy to see. This camera is very convenient to cary everywhere and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: SX 260 canon
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "rosette"
Reviews.Content: Small, slim but packs a lot of features, for taking pictures on the go....this is the camera.  Takes pictures in a snap, no lag. Pics come out crystal clear and I can fit it in my small bag.

Reviews.Title: fabulous small camera
Reviews.Author: Theresa Alexander
Reviews.Content: I take pictures of family and wildlife and this little camera is perfect. The 20x optical zoom lets me catch the animals outside our back door and still takes beautiful indoor pictures. The only con is the location of the flash, but I've gotten used to that and take most of my pictures without flash anyway. There are lots of features that I don't even know about yet, but that just makes it even more interesting. I would recommend this camera to anyone wanting a powerful camera that is small enough to carry with you anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Love my Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Fishnwmn
Reviews.Content: Wow, This is a terrific little camera.  It fits into a change purse for protection, I don't need a big case hanging around my neck.  The zoom is great when we are at concerts.  The picture is clear, and it's easy to use, not complicated at all.I love it!!!Kathy

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Steven P. Cote
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Great zoom lense. Sturdy construction. Worth what I paid on Amazon. Would buy again if needed a new camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: J3 "J3"
Reviews.Content: So far so good...taken lots of photos inside and out...great camera for point and shoot on the go folks who don't have a clue what an ISO is.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jessica L. "Jessica"
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Lightweight, attractive, excellent auto features but still able to manually change settings. And the pictures are usually clear even when my hands shake significantly.

Reviews.Title: I like this.
Reviews.Author: D. Ky
Reviews.Content: I've always like canon, so when I order this one to replace my old canon I was excited,downside of this camera has low performance of battery drained that fast. The I hate the software that come with it. After installing ImageBrowser Ex I cxant even opened it because it has a conflict the Microsoft silverlight. When I called canon help desk they said they been having a lot of problem with this and they are trying to fixed it.Oh and if you are using windows it and trying to installed this you have to go to canon website to get that version.Aside from that everything else was good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Performer
Reviews.Author: Kiran
Reviews.Content: Liked everything about this cam. Works great and performs great.I have an Nikon DSLR, compared to the DSLR, it performs good for the price range.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Perren Fenrir
Reviews.Content: Love my new camera, has almost every function a DSLR does.  Have yet to find anything I need that it can't do

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Teal
Reviews.Content: Camera came quickly, works wonderfully! Clear, concise pictures. Great resolution, lots of different options for photos. Worth the $$. Not too bulky.

Reviews.Title: Great - but flash pop-up is annoying
Reviews.Author: Natalie Kingsfield
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my partner and though it has an amazing zoom, good quality and size/weight - the pop-up flash feature is annoying as the flash is located directly where most people place their index finger.

Reviews.Title: This camera is mostly just a great value
Reviews.Author: Alex P Janssen Jr - Digital photography since...
Reviews.Content: The range of conditions the camera will handle is great.  Being shock resistant is a big plus.  I accidentally dropped it about 3 feet to a wood floor.  You can imagine my horrified reaction, but there was no apparent damage and it worked fine.The only things I wish they would change for future renditions of this model would be to allow exposure compensation for high speed video, that is greater than 30 frames per sec. and offer a mode for time lapse photography.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: It's a great size and weight that makes it easy to use. The camera has more capabilities than i'll probably ever need and many that will come in very handy.

Reviews.Title: Best quality for money
Reviews.Author: Gashaw
Reviews.Content: Honestly I was lookin for a Nikon camera. But with lower cost, Canon is the best camera you could get in the market. Picture clarity is it's best quality & it has an excellent zooming capacity.Best value for money I spent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Todd Neil
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas, and she loves it. She can take her pictures and even movies, and they come out fine. With her lack of knowledge about photography, it fits the bill perfectly. Thanks Canon.

Reviews.Title: Yes, I love it
Reviews.Author: Almar
Reviews.Content: Because it's the best camera I have had so far - excellent picture quality even in low light condition etc etc.

Reviews.Title: great pics
Reviews.Author: Peggy Hutson
Reviews.Content: I recently owned a Canon an  loved it . but this camera takes clear and great photos.  the  20 zoom is great . my other canon . 12  zoom .  love this camera .  only complaint is the flash . but with the way this  camera takes photos . Will lib  with .  I recommend . Photos are clear.  Really takes good photos

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: K. Keller "KenK"
Reviews.Content: I bought this SX260 for my daughter for Christmas, she loves it. It takes great pictures, the pictures are really clear and sharp, she hasn't had to use the flash yet, because this camera takes the best low light pictures I've ever seen. I bought this camera because consumer reports gave it such a high rating, I figured I couldn't go wrong and I didn't. The 20X zoom works great, my old A560 power shot has a 4X zoom and I thought that was something at the time, the A560 takes good pictures to but nothing like this SX260, all I can say is wow !! The rechargeable battery lasts a long time and she can take plenty of picture's, unlike some cameras that run on regular AA batteries which seem to drain right out even when your not using the camera. So I cant say enough good things about this camera, My daughter loves the fact that its so easy to use and her pictures come out Great, it makes her look like she knows what she doing. And she finally gave me back my camera, because it doesn't take good pictures any more. :)

Reviews.Title: canon SX260
Reviews.Author: Walter Raez
Reviews.Content: I always liked canon cameras, had a sony and many times the lens cover did not open. this ones is the best in compact size.

Reviews.Title: perfect small snapshot camera
Reviews.Author: George H. Gordon "gnarly one"
Reviews.Content: we already own an EOS Rebel Canon for superior photography but this is  a pocket camera that you don't notice nor 'feel' all day long and takes good snapshots..in fact, better than I anticipated..Wife is teacher who is always counted on to take photos at special events [field trips for instance.] She loves it more than me..

Reviews.Title: Aorama sucks
Reviews.Author: cheryl perry
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is excellent, the problem I had was with the seller.  The ad stated, when you purchase this camera you also get a free memory card, which was a lie.  Christmas morning my significant other opened the camera and could not use it as there was no card and the seller after numerous attempts refused to forward us a card.  I explained I could not find any promo code, as I said, the ad stated, comes free with camera.  This has put a bad light on Amazon and Aodrama.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Suzee
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera days before leaving for our first transatlantic cruise from Rome, Italy.  My husband's video camera didn't work from the very first day to his disappointment so I ended up taking over 700 pictures.  The 20X optical zoom was wonderful and all the pictures turned out great.  Hubby is a bird watcher and I had to take some pictures of different birds at a distance for him, the zoom helped and the pictures turned out great.  Recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Ed Donovan
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent.  I got it for my wife and she is very pleased.  The pictures it takes are crystal clear even in low light.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to replace a sony camera we never seemed to get crisp photos from.  What an improvement! What a zoom! Its amazing, I was able to zoom out my back yard, and take a photo of a house number plate across the could-e-sac (about 150yds) behind me, looked as if I was standing on that persons driveway.

Reviews.Title: Got it on Christmas deal
Reviews.Author: Ghana S Rangasamy
Reviews.Content: This is one heck of wonderful camera.  The only issue i see is, the flash in the wrong place.  We keep our hand in the place where the flash is, to hold the camera and it pops up.....first time i used this camera i almost dropped it, because the flash was popping up.  I took one star for that.We really need second battery!

Reviews.Title: Compact, great zoom.
Reviews.Author: Arthur A. Fredrickson
Reviews.Content: It's a canon.  The 20 optical zoom in such a small body is a big plus.  It takes large and fast cards.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Janet Piner
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it takes such beautiful pictures, so crisp and clear. There is alot of features on it that I haven't used yet, although I hope to use soon. The other cameras that I had doesn't measure up to it. I had a Sony and it was so heavy and confusing to me to use, I think I got talked into buying this one by my husband, he thought it would be  a better camera. He took it over and he doesn't even use it, because he forgets what the operation of it. I wanted to sell it, but he said no.

Reviews.Title: Simply The Best
Reviews.Author: G. SOARES
Reviews.Content: I used the snapsort.com to find out wich would be my next Travel-All Purpose-Point and Shoot Camera.This one turns out to be a great one and for the price (without Wi-Fi) that's a great deal for sure!I'm pretty happy with it and now I can only think about when I'll have the budget to spend on a Mirrorless Camera!

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: clay
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for a while but I have so far been happy with the photos that I've taken. My last point-and-shoot was just o.k. The SX260 is really fine. I haven't even yet explored all the features. From the most basic settings to the most advanced. It has it all. I do recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: W. Liu "aqua hobbyist"
Reviews.Content: Another excellent Canon product, with a lot of features.  I would give it a five stars, but it's a bit bulky and the panel tabs look a bit "plastic" and cheap.  It is, however, "made in Japan".  Functionality wise, a very good investment for your money.  It also has a large LCD panel which is perfect for viewing.  Just make sure you put a screen protector to avoid scratching.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: Mitchell J. Vongemmingen "Mitchell J. von Gem...
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for the price point, functions, user-friendly, dimensions, and not to mention that the image quality is beyond superlative!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures!
Reviews.Author: C. Lingerfelt
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning all the features this camera has but so far I'm very pleased. I just returned from a vacation trip with lots of memories to process. This was a good deal from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Cute to Look at; Fun to Use
Reviews.Author: Richard R E Kania
Reviews.Content: Our new Canon camera can do amazing things.  The zoom lense allows great close-ups yet collapses into the case so that it is thin and easily placed in pocket or purse  Great bargain

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Elaine Kelly
Reviews.Content: Excellent ability for perfect photos.  Very happy overall.  My only comment for improvement is the pop up flash is tricky to get use to, although for the compact features of this camera I don't see an option for better placement.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly as described, great price.  We cruise a lot and will definitely use this on the next one.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: its okay - just ok
Reviews.Author: alan geer
Reviews.Content: kinda slow in its response time, like the G12 that I also own, far from quick performance but maybe that is just the pricepoint, regardless of manufacturer....

Reviews.Title: Great features and quality for price
Reviews.Author: Matt "Matt"
Reviews.Content: I have been using a Canon super-zoom compact camera that I bought in 2008, and I have been happy with it but I wanted to upgrade to a newer image sensor and technology.  I bought this camera at $200, and it's been solid.  Canon cameras have two weaknesses, in my opinion-- longer shutter lag and a little bit worse battery life than some competitors.  I have also found that when other people use this camera, the pictures tend to come out "soft" because they move too soon, before the lens has closed.  That being said, the zoom with image stabilization works great and the basic settings are very easy to change if needed.  The picture quality indoor tends to be a little washed out at times with the flash set to auto-- I leave it adjusted two settings lower than full flash to compensate for that (I just leave it set that way for all pictures unless my subject is 12+ feet away).  Outdoor pictures are awesome.I have an DSLR camera for more advanced functions, but I think this SX260 is a good choice for most people.  I bought one for my mom too as a replacement for her 7-year old Canon. She's been happy with hers too.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it
Reviews.Author: Heather Aldridge
Reviews.Content: I loveee this camera to death- I've played with this camera for the last two days now- I'm so obsessed with this camera and the shipping was pretty fast and the item is in really excellent condition. Thanks! :-D

Reviews.Title: Great Shots
Reviews.Author: Terry Newton
Reviews.Content: Given to my daughter per her SPECIFIC request for Christmas. She said it was easy to set up and use and took great quality photos.

Reviews.Title: This is one great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Cedarcrab
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Had to get used to holding it differently since the flash is on top. I put my left thumb on side of camera and my index finger under the lense and tip of index touching the bottom of the rubber strip. This keeps the camera from falling forward. Hope this helps someone. Bought the Wasabi charger with two 1300mha batteries. They last forever and the charger comes with car battery attachment. This one solid camera and look forward to using a lot of its capabilities,

Reviews.Title: Great pictures... akward pop-up flash
Reviews.Author: KellyG
Reviews.Content: I agree with the other reviews that the pop-up flash is akward where it is located and that your index finger at times gets in the way when it is popping-up.. However, this is a great quality camera because 1) it is CANON, and 2) the zoom is great!... I just need to get used to the flash, but this camera is excellent for traveling.

Reviews.Title: Great backup
Reviews.Author: Melissa R. Cattani "Lissa Renee Photography"
Reviews.Content: Pros:This is a nice point-and-shoot. It has the potential to take amazing photos. The clarity can be excellent at times, and the color pops. I like that it has manual/aperture/shutter priority options. It allows for more creativity. I'm still working on discovering every nook and cranny in the settings but there seems to be a wide variety. I had fun playing around with the slow motion video setting. I like that the camera came with a cord to hook up to the computer via USB. That is extremely helpful and it works fast. The LCD screen is nice and large and it's very bright (of course you can change how bright you want it). My Cybershot memory stick Pro duo doesn't fit into the Canon. However, if you have a micro-sd card with an adapter, it fits right into the Canon and works perfectly. I'm glad I discovered that because I didn't want to go out and buy another memory card. I spent too much money as it is.Cons:All of these cons are superficial. Everything is in perfect condition, these are just my observations and preferences.The flash is kind of annoying at times. I'm used to having my finger where it pops up. I also find that the autofocus is a bit slow. Again, I'm still figuring things out, but it seems that it doesn't always focus on what you want it to. I've handed the camera over to friends to take a photo and sometimes it will just come out blurry. This camera is also heavy. I compared it to my Sony Cybershot and the Canon is probably about 1.5x heavier. Not a great addition to my already heavy hand-bag. The power button is in a weird spot. It should be on the opposite side of the shutter button. I've had friends try to take a picture and shut the camera off. It's just an odd spot for the power button. The camera beeps and noises are quite annoying, so I just shut them off.Overall, I'd say this is a great camera. With a few tweaks here and there, it would be an amazing camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera  4 1/2 stars
Reviews.Author: MBC
Reviews.Content: I use a camera in my work as a contractor and often take 500 to 600 pictures a day.under various conditions (dark attics and crawlspaces to full sun).  I am still new to this camera and all of its features, and so far I am very pleased with photos and ease of use. It does what I need and the zoom is powerful and clear. Up close it does well and is clear.The wide-angel lens is amazing.The reason for the 4 star over a 5 star is the battery life. The old AA batteries lasted me nearly all day and these new batteries are good for maybe 200 or so pictures, so I carry three batteries with me and bought a car battery charger. This Canon has a longer battery life than most I looked at.I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: John Retzer
Reviews.Content: I did extensive research on cameras, this one exceeds my expectations. It is simple to use and docks quickly with both a PC and iMac.

Reviews.Title: long zoom
Reviews.Author: xi li
Reviews.Content: Although the images get blurry when the ISO is higher than 800 maybe,  it does offer a amazing long zoom for the daily use

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, a little slow in low light
Reviews.Author: MFA
Reviews.Content: After trying a similar Panasonic and Nikon, the third time with this Canon was the charm. Really nice feature set, incredible pictures in good light (exceptional outdoors), reasonable 'pocket to picture' time. BUT, I am finding it a little slow and finicky indoors in situations where the flash is needed. Takes a few extra seconds to adjust focus for the flash I guess, which can mean the difference between a good and bad picture when the subject is little kids like ours. All of my previous Canons were made in Japan, this one is made in China. Sign of the times, I guess, but pretty disappointing. I'd rather pay an extra $50 for quality for something as important as a family camera.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Jtoons
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera on our trip to Europe last summer and the pictures came out amazing.  My favorite features of this camera are the super long zoom lens, how motion pictures look, and the great presets it has built in.

Reviews.Title: Slow on recovery
Reviews.Author: PCR Dweller
Reviews.Content: Endless hours on the computer, comparing different makes and models, resulted in this purchase.  Pleased with the camera--except it has a slow recovery between pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera beautiful pictures.
Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that was hassle free and took great pictures.  It is compact but still small enough to carry easily in a purse. I took this on vacation in the BVI and my pictures are gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Marc Parillo
Reviews.Content: Cannon hit the sweet spot with this camera.  I bought it as a gift for my wife and she's very happy with it.  The auto or "easy" setting does a good job making bad pictures look better and the manual setting is easy to use if you need to make adjustments to ISO or f-stop settings.  I would highly recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: Oswaldo A. Sosa Requiz "Ozzie San"
Reviews.Content: Great little Camera, easy to use with a great zoom and excellent image quality. My only concern has to be with battery life, but I guess that is something that can be dealt with.

Reviews.Title: My first experience with Canon cameras
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: Camera is very impressive,Many advantagesThe only disadvantage position of the flash and battery consumption implemented quicklyBut you can avoid the flash and take precaution to buy an extra battery

Reviews.Title: Good but complicated.
Reviews.Author: Saul Nathanson
Reviews.Content: Technically its a great camera in terms of variety of functions and picture quality. My problem is the controls are a little complex and often buried in sub-menus. That's if you know which menu and sub-menu among many. You almost have to carry the manual with you whereever you go.

Reviews.Title: amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Correa
Reviews.Content: so easy to use, and such great quality and options for both video and pics...lots of fun guaranteed!!!if you want something easy to use and great quality go 4 it

Reviews.Title: Great camera, highly satisfied
Reviews.Author: Biotexts2
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera based on Amazon reviews.  Needed a replacement for a 'pocket camera' for casual use.  After taking a few hundred shots I must say I am very impressed with the sharpness of photos and the ease of operation.  The camera turns on quickly and is quiet.  The auto flash seems powerful in most situations where it activates.  The very large view screen makes photo review easy.  The stabilization feature works well except in low light situations, where the camera is not held steady enough.  With an 8 GB card, I can take photos over weeks of travel or activities and download at leisure. The default setting is for 6 MB pictures - odd with all the high tech features, GPS tagging, etc that I will probably never use, that this camera's resolution default is for making large size paper prints.  Who prints pictures anymore?  I had to install the camera manual from the included CD, which also threw various photo programs on my computer that I didn't really want, in order to find out how to lower the resolution down 4 notches to .3 MB for email sharing.  Or I could use Photoshop to crop and reduce size for individual pics.

Reviews.Title: Review of camera
Reviews.Author: Ken Chisholm
Reviews.Content: Its small yet has very high resoluton .  ai take it fish and hiking with me and of coarse visiting grand children without having a big bag to lug around

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: vlang
Reviews.Content: great point and shoot - superb picture quality inside and outside, sun and rain, night or dawn - great video!!!

Reviews.Title: Wow -  so much great features on this camera
Reviews.Author: Catwalk803
Reviews.Content: I received this as a very unexpected Christmas present.  Rouge color is quite cute too.  I'm still in the learning process of this camera since there are so many more features on it than my last Sony point and shoot camera.  I also purchased an EyeFi card for it and it seamlessly sends my photos to computer wirelessly.  How cool is that?This is the only point and shoot camera that I know of it 20X zoom.  You can also have the camera use presets or you can make it totally programmable by the touch of a button.GET it -- you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Low Light Camera!!
Reviews.Author: KellBella
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for a camera for years that shoots well at dusk and night time and this camera definitely does just that! It has a lot of cool filters and features. I also love that it has an independent movie button, so you don't have to search for the movie mode to shoot. It also has a slow motion movie mode which is really cool as well! A lot of reviewers complain about the battery life, but is better than I thought it would be. Lasts a few hours of continuous shooting, however, I did purchase a secondary battery to switch out and I have had to use it on several occasions of all day shooting.The cons of using this camera though is that is does not like shooting things in action unless you are familiar with setting up correct manual settings. The other issue is the pop up flash - until you get used to this feature, it can sort of be a pain.

Reviews.Title: awesome so far
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: bought it for $199 and it seems to be a very easy to use camera with high quality - signed up for the credit card and applied the $50 discount right to the camera, and now I have an amazon credit card

Reviews.Title: Great, easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: David Reynders
Reviews.Content: I love the camera. It is easy to use, packed with features. MY wife loves it too and she hates tech.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX260
Reviews.Author: J D Quimby "Jim Dog"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, works great.  Slightly larger than expected.  A little concerned with the mode selector dial and it's potential for  getting damaged.  As it sits a little up and out from the camers back.

Reviews.Title: Very impressive
Reviews.Author: wing
Reviews.Content: I love traveling and now I can take quite good pictures with it during my recent vocation. It takes much better pictures than iPhone or the basic canon. I will not compare it with DLR, because I think DLR is too complicated and heavy for my simple purpose--taking nice pictures during traveling and everyday life easily.If you want to buy it, I recommend you buying an additional battery. In this way, you don't need to worry about the battery thing anymore.Something I bought together with this: (this is not advertisement, just for your convenience or comparison)1.case  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003F7DWH8/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_52.additional battery.  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004EYSNBG/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_33.memory card  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007M54E08/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_6I am happy with all of these items!

Reviews.Title: Happy so far
Reviews.Author: Melydi "Melydi"
Reviews.Content: I think this camera takes great pics, and I like all the extra settings that it has (The color accent setting is my favorite). It has a little weight to it but its very small, I carry it in my pocket. Super happy with it so far

Reviews.Title: very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "shibari master"
Reviews.Content: My initial impression is very good. I have been taking christmas photos and other things and aam quite favorably pleased. However, I am a Master Gardener and bought this camera so I could have a smaller camera with me at all times to record things of interest to my Master Gardening. It is winter In NJ and I won't get to see if the canmers meets my expectations for a few months. I have no reason to suspect that it won't pass with fluing colors

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: michele hayes
Reviews.Content: I am the biggest fan of the Powershot cannon's..This camera has met my goa;s and needs far beyond my expectations. I give it a 5 star for everything it has to offer on a small camera/Great pictures!!!!

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: Deborah L Martin
Reviews.Content: So far this Camera is taking great pictures that will add hours of memories as the children grow up.  It fits in a pocketbook and is always available for that special moment.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Nina Baker
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera. It is so small but does big things in taking pictures. I would reccomend it to all.

Reviews.Title: The battery charger and picture quality is great
Reviews.Author: William Bowers
Reviews.Content: Love that it has a rechargeable battery.Takes great pictures also.Nice and compact for keeping in pocket.It is always fast to get to and snap a picture

Reviews.Title: Really great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my sx230hs this camera is what the 230 should of been, no wireframe firmware problem with the flash popping up on start up no slow zoom it just works. Also never buy from best buy bh photo you get quality I can beat my chest about how long I've been a photographer but I've found buying from bh I never had a problem also this camera is not for the amateur photographer  you will find this camera complex and hard to you use, buy a lower series camera. I bought this camera for the features and you can't beat 20x optical zoom.
